H0.text: Name the capital city of the Canadian Province of British Columbia. Victoria

H1.text: Name the capital city of the Canadian Province of British Columbia. Vancouver

H2.text: Name the capital city of the Canadian Province of British Columbia. Kelowna

H3.text: Name the capital city of the Canadian Province of British Columbia. CIVI

A4.text: The capital of British Columbia is Victoria, while the province's largest city is Vancouver.

A5.text: British Columbia's capital is Victoria, at the southeastern tip of Vancouver Island.
